caption:
Farewell, Sackboy 🫡

On October 8th, Sony announced, “After 10 years of playing, creating and sharing content in LittleBigPlanet 3, the game and our entire range of LittleBigPlanet DLC will be removed from the PlayStation Store on October 31st 2024.”

🔗 You can still buy a copy at GameStop: Link in bio
